This is the repoistory for codes used for my Master's thesis, titled "Wage inequality in India during 2017-18". The Periodic Labour Force Survey (PLFS) of 2017-18 by the NSSO has been used for this project.

FV- First Visit
RV- Revist
PER- Person
HH- Household

PER FV- codes for cleaning and running analysis using individual level micro data from PLFS. One may use this file for reproducimg my thesis results.
PER RV- codes for cleaning and running analysis using individual level micro data from PLFS (revisit)

HH FV&RV, HH RV - codes for cleaning household level micro data
